meanings.definition: The act of choosing or selecting something as an option.
meanings.sent1: Her optioning of the dessert from the menu made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: The optioning of a movie to watch on Friday night can be a tough decision.
meanings.sent3: His optioning of the same shirt as his friend was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The optioning of a new car felt like picking a winning lottery ticket.
meanings.sent5: The optioning of a vacation destination was filled with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The process of obtaining the right to buy or sell something at a specified price within a certain time frame.
meanings.sent1: The optioning of the house was a big step towards their dream home.
meanings.sent2: Investors often engage in optioning to secure favorable deals.
meanings.sent3: The optioning of the last piece of cake caused a playful argument.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was optioning her future when signing the contract.
meanings.sent5: The optioning of the rare painting was a strategic move for the art collector.
